argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvs.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvs.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvs.6 | |- N = ( normCV ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_nvs | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. CC /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A S B ) ) = ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl3an2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A S B ) ) = ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_absid | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) -> ( abs ` A ) = A ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) /\ B e. X ) -> ( abs ` A ) = A ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( abs ` A ) x. ( N ` B ) ) = ( A x. ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A S B ) ) = ( A x. ( N ` B ) ) ) |
